column5: HELLO  I would like to share accommodations for the Lakair fishing week.  JUNE 18 -23 . I have my own transportation and boat . I am looking for a place to sleep and eat . IF there is anyone else in need of the same type of thing please give me a call  and maybe we can set somthing up that is good for us both. MY brother may come but he won't know untill the last minute . I would like to get a booking in A.S.A.P.    MR PIKE .  KEITH.
